level.heading: District of Columbia repayment option.
level.text: The District of Columbia retains the right to direct the Authority to purchase its own bonds and notes subject to the terms and conditions of § 10- 1202.11(h), for the purpose of dissolving or altering the Authority after such bonds and notes are cancelled or defeased.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-188, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-1201.01.
